metadata.title: CVE-2021-37220 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: MuPDF through 1.18.1 has an out-of-bounds write because the cached color converter does not properly consider the maximum key size of a hash table. This can, for example, be seen with crafted "mutool draw" input.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
